verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Siddhaparatuvu satruvu yeduta bhojanapu balla 2 Nuneto na tala antiyunnavu. Na ginne nindi porlucunnadi 2.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manuṣyula kapato payamu nundi cucunnavu Manpitivi vakkalahamunundi gudaramulo dacucunnavu.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Niku virodhamuga ceyabadina e ayudhamunu Niluvadu niku virodhamuga ennadainanu vardhilladananenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nyaya vimarsalo edirin̄cuvaru niluvaru ennadunu Cetuvu nivu nera sthapana cera dennadu dapuku varu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova sevakula bhagamu mariyu svasthyamu idiye Yehova valane dasulu niti ide yehova selaviccu vakku{/lang-eng}
